title: Hackerone is not properly deleting user id

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

vulnerability_information:
**Summary:**
Long  ago, i had an account on hackerone that is now deleted.
I used the alias email provided by h1 to sigbup on a site for bug testing.
To my surprise, i receive an email to my account routed from an alias email that should not exist.

**Description:**

### Steps To Reproduce

1. SignUp on H1
2.  Use h1 alias email to signup on some website
3.  Delete h1 account and the email still exists

### Optional: Your Environment (Browser version, Device, etc)

 * 

### Optional: Supporting Material/References (Screenshots)

 * as you can see.the email i just received. You can check your database that **â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ** dont exist in your database coz I deleted the account long back..but you can see the email address
.
 
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

## Impact

Privacy concern

activities.message:
Hi @bhole_nath,

Thank you for your submission. I hope you are well. Your report is currently being reviewed and the HackerOne triage team will get back to you once there is additional information to share.

Have a great day! 

Kind regards,
@forest_dweller

Hi @bhole_nath,

Thank you for your report!

I have reached out to the internal team at HackerOne for verifying if this is the expected behaviour. I will get back to you as soon as I hear back from them. Please bear with us in the meantime.

Thank you for your patience.

Cheers,
@forest_dweller

Hi @bhole_nath - thanks for bringing this to our attention! I don't believe this is supposed to happen. We'll check with the engineering team that's responsible for this and confirm what's going on here. Thanks!
Hello! Thank you for triageing the report.

Hi, team!
Just to add.
I think the severity should be updated to high bealcause the risk is much higher. 
Recently,I tried to signup on some website with that email and yes its working.
You can see the poc screenshot.
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Hello team!
Not heard from you in a while.

I am just pinging you to see additional information I shared above.

Regards,
@bhole_nath

hello @jobert,
any updates here?

Hello @jobert,
Idk why Hackerone is being the most unresponsive program on HackerOne but here is something more of this bug.

The account *â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ* which is deleted was on my gmail say it `abc@gmail.com`  later I created another account on that same gmail after I deleted `â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ` . And I also deleted that account. But I got email on that account to. So, basically every deleted email alias of same gmail's are working finely even after deletion.

Here is the PoC of another deleted account I had on same gmail as of â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ.

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Hi @bhole_nath - thanks for the additional information. As mentioned in my previous comment, we've passed your report on to the engineering team to investigate. We'll get back to you when we have an update. There's no need to ask for an update every day. We'll assess the severity when the team has gotten back to us.

Hello @jobert and H1 engineering team.
How long this will take to get resolved?
Your average resolve time exceeded by 2 days.

Regards,
@bhole_nath
Hi @bhole_nath - the team is still looking into it. We expect to have an update later this week.

Hello @jobert!
You promised an update here.

Regards.

Hello @bhole_nath,

Thanks for your patience! The HackerOne team is still working on this internally, and you will be updated once there is more information to share.

Regards,
@forest_dweller

Hello @jobert @forest_dweller
since its taking long.
Can i get pre-bounty here?
Please.

Regards

Hello!
An update here.
Privacy@hackerone sent an email to one of my non-existent account but not to my existent accounts.

IS it a bug-fixed? Or another Bug?

Hello @hacker101 team . Please reply my above 2 queries.

Hi @bhole_nath,

Hope you are doing well! I have pinged the internal team about this report. I will get back to you as soon as I hear back from them. Please bear with us in the meantime.

Thank you for your patience.

Cheers,
@forest_dweller

Hello team.
Any leads here?

Regards,

Hello  @hacker_ani3s,

Thanks for your patience! The HackerOne team is still working on this internally, and you will be updated once there is more information to share.

Regards,

Please don't reply the same message again.
I have some queries.

&
Is there any case where HackerOne gives pre-bounty?

PleaseðŸ˜Š

@hacker_ani3s

@hacker_ani3s sorry this took so long, while we did have in place code that intended to remove the mapping from the email alias feature, it was actually attempting to remove an invalid identifier. We've pushed a fix for this.

I retested it reference to the report i submitted. You can see above that i became able to sign in in fetlife with this email address "â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ@wearehackerone.com".
I was also able to reset password several time But Now i tried to reset the password and the email never arrived. 
So, the fix is working properly.

This the screenshot attached of reset but the email never arrived.
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
Thanks @hacker_ani3s!

Thank you for the  awesome bounty decision.
Thank you very much.
I want you to redact all the screenshots please.
Hi @hacker_ani3s - sure, no problem, I've redacted the screenshots and the username. Thanks again for the report. This is ready to be disclosed!
